DB_UPDATE_SQLS.SQL: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS images(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT, path TEXT, hash TEXT UNIQUE, tagIds TEXT, isDelete INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tags(id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name TEXT)
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX idx_images_hash ON images (hash)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS version(version INTEGER DEFAULT 1)
ALTER TABLE tags ADD COLUMN count INTEGER DEFAULT 0
